adjectives.description: thiefly (comparative more thiefly, superlative most thiefly)

examples: It would be a sad thing to enter this dark time and then to have an eternal reality stolen and lessened in a thiefly sort of way at the door of death through a life that was lived in a less than honorable fashion.
